meanings.definition: Not having or showing an excessive or exaggerated sense of one's own importance or abilities.
meanings.sent1: She was unarrogant about her achievements, always giving credit to her team.
meanings.sent2: He remained unarrogant despite his success, treating everyone with kindness.
meanings.sent3: The unarrogant cat didn't demand attention, content with a quiet corner.
meanings.sent4: Her unarrogant demeanor was like a gentle breeze in a room full of egos.
meanings.sent5: The unarrogant smile on his face made him instantly likable.

meanings.definition: Modest or humble in behavior or attitude.
meanings.sent1: She wore an unarrogant outfit, blending in with the crowd.
meanings.sent2: His unarrogant nature made him approachable to everyone he met.
meanings.sent3: The unarrogant tree bowed gracefully in the wind, never boasting its height.
meanings.sent4: Her unarrogant words were like a soothing melody in a noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The unarrogant way he accepted praise was truly admirable.
